analysis.summary: MusicLayout.vue defines the top-level layout for all music-related views. It renders a header with back/forward navigation, page title, search bar and user menu; a main region for nested routes; and a persistent music player at the bottom when a track is active.
analysis.purpose: To provide a consistent page frame for the music module, handling navigation controls, search, user links and embedding the router view and player component.
